name: VIRGIN BRAZILIAN WAVY & STRAIGHT HAIR
description:
Medium luster, strong, and durable hair that blends seamlessly with African American or textured hair
* Minimal Tangling and Shedding 
* Natural Color 
* Can be straightened, curled, and also dyed 
* Lasts up to 1 year with proper maintenance 
Free USPS Priority Shipping in US 2-3 days
 
NO REFUND OR EXCHANGE AFTER PURCHASE!
 
**BY PURCHASING YOU AGREE TO A 5-7 DAY PRODUCTION TIME. THE HAIR ARRIVES IN BULK AND THEN IS OUTSOURCED TO BE TIGHTLY MACHINE WEFTED, THEN IT IS INSPECTED FOR QUALITY BEFORE IT IS SHIPPED TO YOU.
 
PLEASE EMAIL IF YOU WANT TO SEE ADDITIONAL PICTURES @ cashmerevirginhair@gmail.com, with your subject line "Additional pictures request."

* Can be straightened, curled, and also dyed

name: WHOLESALE ORDERS FOR STYLISTS AND COMPANIES STARTING THEIR OWN BUSINESS!!!
description:
Would you like to offer your clients your very own Virgin hair line tomorrow? 

We provide active stylists and beauty professionals flawless Virgin hair in private label ready, generic packaging so that stylists on our team can launch their own brand and market the hair as their own. 
We ship domestically and interntionally to other companies and stylist, including the UK and Nigeria. We provide discounted pricing off of our already low retail prices to enable the stylists on our Team to build in a healthy profit when they sell and install the hair. We also give the stylists on our team the flexibility to mix and match sizes and textures in their order any way they want. There are also flat rate prices for bundle lengths; so no special prices for each length in a texture.

**PLEASE NOTE:WHOLESALE IS ANY ORDER OVER 20 BUNDLES OF FILIPINO (WAVY & STRAIGHT) OR BRAZILIAN HAIR (WAVY & STRAIGHT)

Just want to try out for the quality of our hair first?

Please email me for these wholesale order immediately to get a direct response & to accomadate your order at : 
cashmerevirginhair@gmail.com
